courseDescription:
Python is one of the most popular programming languages out there today because it is easy to use. There are many frameworks and libraries available that can be used to build just about anything, including games. One framework that can be used to build games written in Python is called Pygame. The library is easy to install and use and contains all of the components needed to build a simple game. This free online course on computer game development will take you through how to improve a game by adding extra functionality, building new games and other Python projects. You will get to explore other Python frameworks and libraries.

In this course, you will learn how to integrate custom objects and Pygame components. Study decision making along with how to update object positioning and render graphics. Additionally, you will understand the process of implementing game logic and how to build an RPG-style (role-playing game) game. You don't need prior programming experience to begin this course, although you need some basic Python knowledge. As long as you have a Windows or a Mac OS, you are all set! Another thing you will need is the willingness to learn and challenge yourself.

This course is great for beginners in Python as you start with fundamentals like how to install Python and Pygame. You will work on creating and running a project so you get familiar with using a main.py file. Also, you will focus on creating and displaying a game window â€“ along with using a game loop to keep the window open. Additionally, you will move to importing and drawing images from the project. In this course, you will understand how to implement custom objects such as GameObject, player and enemy classes. You will see how to implement collision detection to tell when colliding with an enemy. Lastly, you finish up with implementing game logic. This is an exciting course where you will be able to learn about Python and Pygame. One of the best ways to build your programming skills is to build a practical project that you can enjoy once it's finished. This course is targeted at anyone interested in developing simple games or improving their Python skills. Sign up for this course today and begin your next learning journey!
